com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.util

Class TableDataFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.util.TableDataFactory

  • public class TableDataFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    The TableDataFactory provides a series of static factory methods through which implementations of TableData interfaces can be accessed. The intentions of these methods is to make the implementation "invisible" to the user; as such, these should be used to decouple classes from specific implementations and no implementation-specific details (such as efficiencies and limitations) should be expected nor taken for granted.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataColumn

        public static <T,K> DataColumn<T> getDataColumn(T[] columnData,
                                java.lang.String columnLabel,
                                DataType type,
                                TableKey<K> primaryKey)
        Get a DataColumn instance. This method is parametrized by the data column's type and its key type.
        Parameters:
        columnData - The column's data.
        columnLabel - The column's label.
        type - The column's data type.
        primaryKey - The primary key to use for the column.
        Returns:
        a new DataColumn instance.

      • getDataRow

        public static DataRow getDataRow(java.lang.Object[] rowData,
                 java.lang.String[] columnLabels,
                 DataType[] columnTypes,
                 boolean coercionOn)
        Get a DataRow instance.
        Parameters:
        rowData - The row's data.
        columnLabels - The labels for each column in this data row, ordered as they are in the row.
        columnTypes - The data types of each column in this data row, ordered as they are in the row.
        coercionOn - Indicator for whether this data row will coerce data or not.
        Returns:
        a new DataRow instance.

      • getDataTable

        public static DataTable getDataTable(TableSchema schema)
        Get an empty (no data) DataTable instance..
        Parameters:
        schema - A schema describing the table.
        Returns:
        a new DataTable instance.

      • getDataTable

        public static DataTable getDataTable(TableSchema schema,
                     java.lang.Object[][] data)
        Get a DataTable instance filled with data.
        Parameters:
        schema - A schema describing the table.
        data - The data to fill the table with. This data should be organized as required by the DataTable.addDataByRow(Object[][]) method - its first dimension is the row, and second dimension the column entries.
        Returns:
        a new DataTable instance filled with data.

      • getDataSet

        public static DataSet<DataTable> getDataSet()
        Get a DataSet instance.
        Returns:
        a new DataSet instance.

      • getTableKey

        public static <T> TableKey<T> getTableKey(DataTable table,
                          java.lang.String columnLabel)
        Get a TableKey instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the table key.
        Parameters:
        table - The table against which the key is to be built.
        columnLabel - The label for the column to build the key on.
        Returns:
        a new TableKey instance.
